name: Unfinished Business (MelinaRosales)
description:
The year is 1997. 

You are a medium called to investigate a haunted mansion where the murder of an up-and-coming jazz singer took place 75 years ago.

Hunt for clues, trust your intuition, and solve puzzles to help lay her spirit to rest in this point-and-click adventure game. 

Currently in development.

How to play:

Use your mouse to look around the environment and click on items around the house.

Created by GHOST JUICE PRODUCTIONS:

Melina Rosales: Programmer, UX Designer

Jasmine Mitchell: Environment and prop artist, SFX curator 

Elisa Gonzalez: Narrative Design, Character Art

Brandyn Harris: UI  artist
